entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
